document_name: Act on Verification and Notification of the Origin of Electricity
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/FIN/2003/FIN-2003-01-01-Act on Verification and Notification of the Origin of Electricity_4538032eca0bbbb05d01282eb098c6bc.pdf
document_description: The act provides procedures by which a power point operator can verify and an electricity vendor's minimum obligations to notify the origin of the electricity. Among its wide ranging provisions, the act requires an electricity vendor to inform through electricity bills or promotions materials the proportion of energy sources and details of CO2 emissions and radioactive waste generated.
